member.name: T:osu.Game.Rulesets.Hitokori.Objects.Drawables.ArchedConnector
member.summary: A connector is a path between 2 tiles. Its center position is offset by whatever the offset is from the "around" position, that is if you set its position to `around - parent.Position` its start will be centered at "around";

member.name: T:osu.Game.Rulesets.Hitokori.Objects.Drawables.Connector
member.summary: A connector is a path between 2 tiles. Its start position is offset by whatever the offset is from the "from" tile, that is if you set its position to `from.HoldPosition - parent.Position` its start will be centered at "from";
